title: Game Theory and Simulation Channel
body: This Discord channel would be a war room for Aavegotchi game theory. The first subject would be exclusively about Portal Summoning and Collateral Staking. Once clear strategies emerge, we increase the simulation complexity.
choices: Yes Create this  Game Theory Channel
author: 0x90F440e449C47f4cAF78c62c131DFC38ab491d4A
